about_the_game:
Become a vampire. Strike from the darkness and drink the blood of your prey. Use stealth, persuasion, and an arsenal of upgradable abilities to sneak past enemies undetected or punish the guilty in the seedy backstreets of nighttime Venice.

Vampire: The Masquerade - Justice is an open-ended, narrative Adventure RPG set in the World of Darkness universe. You have the power to strike fear into the hearts of a criminal underworld as an untraceable shadow, picking off targets one-by-one.

FEATURES

  • Full campaign-based adventure RPG with hours of gameplay. Choose your path through levels, complete bonus objectives, upgrade powers and build a character suited to your playstyle.

  • Stealth is your weapon. Take to the rooftops and seek new paths away from enemy eyes, use traps to snatch up unsuspecting prey, and slip past unseen through enemy defenses. 

  • Punish the guilty with brutal abilities. Launch towards foes with immense force or boil their insides. Sneak up and sink in your fangs, or use your crossbow to take down or distract guards from afar.

  • See a different side of Venice with gorgeous visuals that lead you through the winding streets and canals of the City of Water under the cover of night.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-7500 / Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / RX 580 - 6GB VRAM
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, Index, Quest via link och Oculus Rift S
  • Additional Notes: Not supporting Windows MR or HTC Vive
